surface.$description: Surface background color. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

muted.$description: Muted background color for subtle surfaces. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

subtle.$description: Subtle background color for slightly emphasized surfaces. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

inverse.$description: Inverse background color for dark surfaces. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

primary.$description: Primary brand color. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Uses Brand-700 as the canonical anchor color. Other contexts/themes may override this value.
Primary accent color. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Uses Accent-600 (Viking Blue) as the canonical anchor color. Other contexts/themes may override this value.
